rateBasis.tariffNotes:
Rate Notes:
Hotel Tariff Notes: Compulsory Tourism Dirham to be paid by guest directly at the hotel per room per night valid from 31st March 2014 onwards. Rates are based on existing bedding only. No show and early departure will be subjected to 100% charge. No name change will be accepted. As of April 1, 2014, all rooms in Vida Downtown Dubai will be non-smoking as part of our commitment to promote guest wellness. The policy does not cover public areas where the appropriate local regulations will apply. Existing reservation cannot be cancelled and rebooked under lower promotion.
Half Board / Full Board supplements are not applicable over below periods: • 24 December 2019 – 01 January 2020 (both days inclusive). • 24 December 2020 – 01 January 2021 (both days inclusive).
NOTE: The swimming pool will be closed from the 6th until the 9th of May and undergoing routine maintenance. In the meantime you can dip at the sister property, Manzil Downtown, Please note guests are not allowed to cancel existing bookings and rebook. The hotel has the right to reject the booking.
Half Board Supplement will be applicable for either lunch OR dinner, per day. Half Board Supplement includes a 3-course set menu inclusive of soft drinks. The Tourism Dirham Fee charged per room per night is applicable when booking guest rooms & suites and it will be collected directly at the property and is not reflected in the room rate.

No show and early departure will be subjected to 100% charge. No name change will be accepted. As of April 1, 2014, all rooms in Vida Downtown Dubai will be non-smoking as part of our commitment to promote guest wellness. The policy does not cover public areas where the appropriate local regulations will apply. Existing reservation cannot be cancelled and rebooked under lower promotion.
Half Board / Full Board supplements are not applicable over below periods: • 24 December 2019 – 01 January 2020 (both days inclusive). • 24 December 2020 – 01 January 2021 (both days inclusive).
NOTE: The swimming pool will be closed from the 6th until the 9th of May and undergoing routine maintenance. In the meantime you can dip at the sister property, Manzil Downtown, Please note guests are not allowed to cancel existing bookings and rebook. The hotel has the right to reject the booking. The Tourism Dirham Fee charged per room per night is applicable when booking guest rooms & suites and it will be collected directly at the property and is not reflected in the room rate.
Rates cannot be rebooked or canceled. For further information, kindly contact the hotel directly.
